title: Episode 9 - Vito's Pizza
itunes:title: Episode 9 - Vito's Pizza
description: Come along to Vito's Pizza, the best New York Style pizza in LA! Vito shares a lifetime of stories and experience and sends me home with his secret dough. Give a listen and stop by 846 N. La Cienega Blvd. You'll love me forever.
